languages.text: {n}Странное ощущение проходит так же внезапно, как и началось. Астропат качает головой.{/n} "Я знаю, зачем вы здесь, Ваша Светлость. И при всем моем уважении, я прошу вас передумать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Заккери Вайс оборачивается к вам задолго до того, как вы подходите.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Я знаю зачем вы здесь".

languages.text: {n}The strange sensation passes as suddenly as it arises. The Choirmaster shakes his head.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."
languages.original_text: {n}Странное ощущение проходит так же внезапно, как и началось. Астропат качает головой.{/n} "Я знаю, зачем вы здесь, Ваша Светлость. И при всем моем уважении, я прошу вас передумать".

traits.locale_text: {n}The strange sensation passes as suddenly as it appears. The Choirmaster shakes his head.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."
{n}Zacchary Weisz turns toward you long before you approach.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."

{n}Choirmaster Weisz turns toward you long before you approach.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."

{n}The strange sensation passes as suddenly as it arises. The Choirmaster shakes his head.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."

languages.text: {n}La extraña sensación cesa tan deprisa como apareció. El maestro del Coro menea la cabeza.{/n} «Sé por qué ha venido, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Y, con todo el debido respeto, le solicito que lo reconsidere».
languages.original_text: {n}The strange sensation passes as suddenly as it arises. The Choirmaster shakes his head.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: {n}La extraña sensación cesa tan deprisa como apareció. El maestro del Coro menea la cabeza.{/n} «Sé por qué ha venido, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Y, con todo el debido respeto, le solicito que lo reconsidere».

languages.text: {n}奇妙な感覚は、沸き起こると同時に過ぎ去った。クワイアーマスターが首を横に振る。{/n}「ここに来た理由は存じています、陛下。恐れながら、考え直していただけませんでしょうか」
languages.original_text: {n}The strange sensation passes as suddenly as it arises. The Choirmaster shakes his head.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: {n}奇妙な感覚は、沸き起こると同時に過ぎ去った。クワイアーマスターが首を横に振る。{/n}「ここに来た理由は存じています、陛下。恐れながら、考え直していただけませんでしょうか」

languages.text: {n}不过，这种突如其来的古怪感觉随即便消失了。唱诗大师威茨摇了摇头。{/n}“我知道您来这里是为了什么，大人。恕我直言，我请求您重新考虑一下。”
languages.original_text: {n}The strange sensation passes as suddenly as it arises. The Choirmaster shakes his head.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: {n}不过，这种突如其来的古怪感觉随即便消失了。唱诗大师威茨摇了摇头。{/n}“我知道您来这里是为了什么，大人。恕我直言，我请求您重新考虑一下。”

languages.text: {n}Das seltsame Gefühl verschwindet ebenso schnell, wie es gekommen war. Der Chormeister schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich weiß, warum Ihr hier seid, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Und bei allem Respekt bitte ich Euch, es Euch anders zu überlegen."
languages.original_text: {n}The strange sensation passes as suddenly as it arises. The Choirmaster shakes his head.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das seltsame Gefühl verschwindet ebenso schnell, wie es gekommen war. Der Chormeister schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich weiß, warum Ihr hier seid, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Und bei allem Respekt bitte ich Euch, es Euch anders zu überlegen."

languages.text: {n}La sensation étrange disparaît aussi soudainement qu'elle était apparue. Le maître de chœur secoue la tête.{/n} « Je sais ce qui vous amène, Votre Seigneurie, et avec tout le respect qui vous est dû, je vous prie instamment d'y réfléchir à deux fois. »
languages.original_text: {n}The strange sensation passes as suddenly as it arises. The Choirmaster shakes his head.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sensation étrange disparaît aussi soudainement qu'elle était apparue. Le maître de chœur secoue la tête.{/n} « Je sais ce qui vous amène, Votre Seigneurie, et avec tout le respect qui vous est dû, je vous prie instamment d'y réfléchir à deux fois. »

languages.text: {n}Tuhaf his, ortaya çıktığı gibi kayboluyor. Koro Şefi başını sallıyor.{/n} "Buraya neden geldiğinizi biliyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ve affınıza sığınarak sizden tekrar düşünmenizi rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The strange sensation passes as suddenly as it arises. The Choirmaster shakes his head.{/n} "I know why you are here, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And with all due respect, I am asking you to reconsider."
